recipesJson.name: Clogged Artery Custard
recipesJson.author: TorturedZen
recipesJson.description: One of my custard recipes from the early days of DIY. Smooth and buttery.

reviews.text: This stuff is grrrrrrrrreat! ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ ğŸ˜ I liked the looks of this recipe so much that I mixed up 60mls before work this morning... I had it in my pocket all day and shook it up, just tried it and I gotta say it tastes GD Delicious already, so after a week or 2 she'll really shine!!! Nice job!
